Articles.Content: Well I immediately went into economic decline:P I'm losing 3 mil a month and don't have the money to fix it.On the bright side Tekia has a good standard of living and no rebellions.
nation name/ link?
Republic of Tekia.Democracy siding slightly with U.S.S.R,Leader is same

probable should not have spent your money on siding with the ussr

also use humanitarian aid as much as you can. If anything go into the red bring it up as soon as possible also check out there wiki

I am slorch and The one
Dammit I'm worse than Mussolini in regards to budget -4mil TO THE WIKI
really I found the best combination of government and economy to be junta and mixed. mixed especially if you in asia so you can use the SEZ

Is anyone willing to spare $95,000 K? I still need 19 more nuclear reactors to build a nuke.

whats the name?

Also, due to excess economic growth Kethane Nation is asking for 5 units of oil. (Look at my nation's profile and you'll see why.) Mann, oil price is so high...

Edited October 13, 2013 by Designer225
The site is still down. If tomorrow the site is still down, mods may shut this thread down. I'm growing tired of it anyway.
yah i think the goons have finally ended the game so this can be locked .and put on the rack of old.

hey can I join.

oh and btw this was posted by rumsod on the facebook page a few hours ago:

"BLOC will be back up very soon. The game underwent mass cheating and was hacked during a time I was simply unable to handle it due to personal issues, and then was taken down due to the site hosting things verboten in Germany. I am sorry for the downtime.

Before it is back up however I will be changing the way registration works to prevent multying and implement significantly better ways to identify and catch cheaters.

There will not be a reset for now, all data (except the forum) has been saved up to 24 hours before it was shut down, but I have decided there will be one in the future when I feel the basics of the game are complete. BLOC will be clearly identified as a beta.

I am sorry for this and not responding sooner. This is my first project like this and it got overwhelming fast."
yes! there is still hope
yay im going to build a new country though by the name Empria the great industrial country of the north.
They aren't reseting the countries, only the country stats. No need to make a new one.
Well good luck rumsod, hope you didn't trigger a FATAL reset.

Perhaps a link to the Facebook page?
